Tamara McKnight | WDD 130

Hello! My name is Tamara Helen McKnight, I am 32 years old and I stay in Johannesburg in South Africa. I am a very proud wife to the most amazing Zulu Man who makes life beautiful. I am the Sales Manager for a perfume manufacturing company and I love spending time with my family.I am currently studying Wed Development and Software Development through BYU and I am loving every minute of it! My goal is to become a Full Stack Developer and start my own business one day.
